meanings.definition: False information intended to deceive or mislead.
meanings.sent1: The disinformation about the treasure hunt led many astray.
meanings.sent2: The disinformation campaign caused confusion among the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The disinformation about the alien invasion made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The disinformation acted like a shadow, hiding the truth from view.
meanings.sent5: The disinformation was a tangled web of lies waiting to be unraveled.

meanings.definition: The act of spreading false information to deceive or mislead.
meanings.sent1: The disinformation spread quickly through social media.
meanings.sent2: The disinformation was a tool used by the enemy to sow discord.
meanings.sent3: The disinformation dance at the party was a hilarious prank.
meanings.sent4: The disinformation flowed like a river, distorting reality.
meanings.sent5: The disinformation painted a false picture of the situation.
